{"id":626926670,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1643047031,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"195 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/626926670/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"9.3 MB","code":"/*\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\n--||author : codechaser||-- \n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\n*/\nclass Solution\n{\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows)\n    {\n\n        if (numRows == 1)\n            return s;\n\n        char arr[numRows][1000];\n\n        for (int i = 0; i < numRows; i++)\n            for (int j = 0; j < 1000; j++)\n                arr[i][j] = '?';\n\n        int direction = 1, i = 0, j = 0, k = 0;\n        while (k < s.size())\n        {\n            if (i == numRows)\n                direction = 1 - direction, i -= 2, j++;\n            if (i == -1)\n                direction = 1 - direction, i += 2, j++;\n            if (direction)\n                arr[i][j] = s[k], i++;\n            else\n                arr[i][j] = s[k], j++, i--;\n            k++;\n        }\n\n        string ans = \"\";\n        for (int i = 0; i < numRows; i++)\n            for (int j = 0; j < 1000; j++)\n                if (arr[i][j] != '?')\n                    ans.push_back(arr[i][j]);\n\n        return ans;\n    }\n};\n////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\n/*\n    |---------------------------------------------------|\n    |||   https://codeforces.com/profile/codechaser   |||\n    |||   https://www.codechef.com/users/codechaser   |||\n    |||        https://github.com/code-chaser         |||\n    |---------------------------------------------------|\n*/\n////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion"}
